header.title: Naturally Dance
header.description: is a dance association that promotes dance! We prepare participants for the dance floor in a relaxed and pleasant atmosphere. We organize Dance and Disco Parties, dance lessons, dance workshops, humanitarian actions through dance and other interesting activities. With us you will master elegant Ballroom, hot Caribbean and Latin rhythms, as well as African Kizomba. We have hosted the masters of this African dance and we transfer the materials from all the dance seminars to you in our dance classes.

samba.name: Samba
samba.description: A lively Brazilian dance with African roots, characterized by rapid steps and rhythmic hip movements

rumba.name: Rumba
rumba.description: A slow, romantic Cuban dance often called the 'dance of love'

chaChaCha.name: Cha Cha Cha
chaChaCha.description: A playful, flirtatious dance with Cuban origins, characterized by its syncopated steps

jive.name: Jive
jive.description: An energetic dance based on swing with fast kicks and flicks

englishWaltz.name: English Waltz
englishWaltz.description: A smooth, elegant ballroom dance in 3/4 time with long, flowing movements

vienneseWaltz.name: Viennese Waltz
vienneseWaltz.description: A faster version of the waltz with continuous turns and rotational movements

foxtrot.name: Foxtrot
foxtrot.description: A smooth, progressive dance characterized by long, continuous flowing movements

salsa.name: Salsa
salsa.description: A lively partner dance with Cuban and Puerto Rican roots, featuring intricate turn patterns

bachata.name: Bachata
bachata.description: A romantic dance from the Dominican Republic with simple steps and sensual hip motion

merengue.name: Merengue
merengue.description: A simple, fun dance from the Dominican Republic with a marching rhythm

kizomba.name: Kizomba
kizomba.description: A sensual, smooth partner dance from Angola with close connection and subtle movements

blues.name: Blues
blues.description: A slow, expressive dance focused on musicality and connection between partners

disco.name: Disco
disco.description: A high-energy dance style popularized in the 1970s with flashy moves and rhythmic steps

rnr.name: Rock 'n' Roll
rnr.description: Rock and Roll dance with acrobatic elements and lively movements

sirtaki.name: Sirtaki
sirtaki.description: A popular Greek dance that starts slow and gradually increases in pace

milos.title: MiloÅ¡ Ä†emaloviÄ‡, Naturally Dance founder and dance teacher
milos.description: Has always been a big fan of music, organized hundreds of dance events in various places, being a DJ on dance parties, animated the people around him as well as created music mixes of different genres.

sandra.title: Sandra Svetlica Ä†emaloviÄ‡, Naturally Dance manager and dance teacher
sandra.description: Graduated in Sociology at the Faculty of Philosophy, University of Belgrade. All her life she was interested in dance, and her great talent and love for dance was discovered by MiloÅ¡ in 2015.

discoParty.title: Belgrade Disco Fever Party
discoParty.description: Naturally Dance is the creator and organizer of the Beogradska Disko Å½urka - Belgrade Disco Fever Party ðŸ‘‰ the most popular DISCO Party in Serbia and across the Balkan region! Beogradska Disko Å½urka - Belgrade Disco Fever was visited by thousands of people of all generations, nationalities, affiliations, occupations and religions. The audience classified the Beogradska Disko Å½urka - Belgrade Disco Fever Party among the best cultural manifestations of Belgrade, emphasizing that its arrival created a revolution in Belgrade's night life, because all generations of different preferences and background spend time together dancing to music that once created a similar revolution.

kizomba.title: Belgrade Kizomba Flashmob
kizomba.description: Naturally Dance designed the choreography and realized the project Kizomba dance Flash mob - Belgrade, Serbia in which we promoted the culture of Africa with the culture of Serbia in Belgrade, on Republic Square with the National Museum, the National Theater and the monument to Knez Mihajlo. In the period from May 13th to July 17th 2018. Naturally Dance prepared and trained Ballroom and Salsa instructors and dancers, so that we can present and promote Kizomba dance with a public performance. Watch Kizomba dance Flash mob - Belgrade, Serbia to see the show.

kizombaBanjaLuka.title: Kizomba in Bosnia and Herzegovina
kizombaBanjaLuka.description: In 2016. Naturally Dance introduced Kizomba in Bosnia and Herzegovia. For more than two months, the Naturally Dance team - Sandra and MiloÅ¡ - traveled every weekend to Banja Luka and provide dance workshops to young Kizomba lovers in the Republic of Srpska. After Naturally Dance teachings, Kizomba began to spread throughout Bosnia and Herzegovina!

newYearParties.title: New Year's Eve Parties
newYearParties.description: Naturally Dance organized mutiple New Year's Eve Parties in Belgrade, Serbia. We celebrated the arrival of the New Year with our friends and dance lovers in a unique atmosphere, with great music and dance! In years, our New Year's Eve Parties are filled with joy, dance and unforgettable moments.

danceWorkshops.title: Dance workshops
danceWorkshops.description: Naturally Dance organized many dance workshops in Belgrade. In addition to individual workshops, we hosted dance masters from all over the world: Nelson Campos (London - UK, with origin from Guinea-Bissau), Fred Maestro (Paris - France, with origin from Martinique (French West Indies)), Robbie Dubbelman (Amsterdam - Netherlands), Helio Santos (Lisbon - Portugal, with origin from Cabo Verde), Ianna Galbraith (Victoria - Canada, with origin from Serbia). Together we shared our knowledge and passion for dance and introduced our dance community to a variety of dance styles. Our workshops covered a wide range of dance styles, from Kizomba to Tap Dance. Each workshop was an opportunity for dancers of all levels to learn new techniques, improve their skills and connect with other dance enthusiasts! You can see photos from all our events, including dance workshops, by clicking on the Facebook link.

danceClasses.title: Dance classes
danceClasses.description: Naturally Dance hosted dance classes in various places in Belgrade. We taught different dance styles, from Ballroom to Latin dances, as well as Salsa and Kizomba. Our dance classes were designed for dancers of all levels, from beginners to advanced. We focused on technique, musicality and connection between partners. Our dance classes were not only an opportunity to learn new dance styles, but also a chance to meet new people and have fun! Join us in our dance classes and experience the joy of dance with Naturally Dance! You can see all our events, including dance classes, by clicking on the Facebook link.
